phrases: You better hope the beast that comes out of the cave is not a monster.
Hey, are you hungry?
Guess he has other things to worry about.
Say, you have never laughed before, have you?
Fine, be that way your whole life for all I care.
I am never going back to my wife.
I want to stay with you forever.
Me too.
Get a room!
Get eaten by a bear!
Take this, and this!
Ow.
What the...
Hey, you all right?
What the heck?
Has he lost his mind?
Hyakkimaru!
Come on out!
Dang it.
It got away.
Hey look, there is a village.
I guess I will have to regain my energy there.
Party is over
But I still want to dance
I cannot even sleep
Someday, one day my passion's fire will
From the beginning I knew
One day the flames would die out
Hey, I thought I did not need anything
But even now, I am so serious
Ah...
I still have time to make it
Ah... but I am going to burn it up, baby
Sorry darling, it is not that easy
But surely it is not that bad either
Give me fire
Light it up, baby.
I am going to burn it up, yeah
Party is over
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
Give me fire
Light it up, baby.
I am going to burn it up, yeah
7 The story of the Jorogumo silk spider
How wretched I am, I cannot even pull myself up.
What a bothersome village.
TRAVELER'S PASS
We have guards out to protect the village now.
Protect from what?
-There is been a kidnapper around here.
-A kidnapper?
Yeah, our villagers keep disappearing almost nightly.
That is what those watchtowers are for.
You let us know if you see anything suspicious.
Hey.
I bet it is that spider monster kidnapping the villagers.
Seems like a big problem for them.
We could help this village out.
I bet there would be a good reward, too.
This, I must complete.
Hey, you!
Are you okay?
Sorry, I did not mean to scare you.
Are you sick?
You are as pale as death.
Come to my house.
I can give you something to eat.
Can you walk?
Yes, I can...
Okay, come with me.
I will suck out his life force first.
Say, what is your name?
I am Yajiro.
I have none.
You do not?
Well then.
There.
Then how about Ohagi?
-Ohagi?
-You were lying in a bed of hagi flowers.
Have it your way.
Okay then, Ohagi.
You must be hungry.
Eat up.
What is this?
Looks nasty.
Go ahead, eat up.
It is good.
Ohagi, if it is okay, tell me where you came from.
It is not, so I will not.
Then why were you lying there?
As if I had a choice.
If I had the strength, I would leave this place this very second.
Are not you going to eat?
Huh?
Oh...
I just ate before you came.
What is that noise?
Do not mind it, eat up.
I have to go to work.
I will be back by dusk.
Eat up and go to sleep.
What a strange human.
It is mine.
Do not touch it.
No rice paddies, no fields.
We might not find any food in this village.
What is going on?
Hey, what is that sign say?
It says there is a reward for finding the kidnapper.
Not that it is helping any in finding the kidnapper.
See, told you so.
That reward is ours then!
What, you know who it might be?
After the reward too?
I would stay out of it if I were you.
We are dealing with a monster here.
A monster?
Quiet, quiet!
Do not stop, keep working!
I bet the monster only comes out once it gets really dark.
We do not have the energy to search during the day.
Got To be smart.
Right, let us go.
I guess this is the most I can do on human food.
Sorry, I got off work late.
You stayed up?
I slept.
But I woke up because of all the noise outside.
Yeah, another man died out at work in the mountains.
It is hard work out in the hot sun.
It is harsh.
Why do you work so hard?
Is it worth dying for?
This is a quarry village.
Our lord will not allow us to slow down.
Humans have no freedom.
You look dreadful.
I see you have eaten, but...
A cockroach.
Why did you let it go?
It is okay for humans to die, but not bugs?
Humans and bugs, they are all the same.
Life is life.
I have never met a human who speaks like that before.
You are strange.
Am I?
Anyways, eat up.
And sleep.
That solves everything.
You are not like any man I have met before.
I guess we both are hungry.
Ugh, I am pooped out.
We walked all night for nothing.
Where is that spider monster hiding?
My brain is not working anymore.
Let us sleep while it is still cool.
Hey, what is that say?
Another man disappeared last night, so the reward went up.
Last night?
But there were not any signs of monsters.
Maybe I was wrong.
Maybe it is not a monster...
Hey, will the man who takes people away get caught?
Do not worry, he will not get caught.
No man of this village would snitch to the lord no matter the reward.
We have nothing else to eat here but bugs and weeds.
Guess we will chew on herbs and rest till night.
Ohagi, you are growing weaker and weaker.
Are you...
You left mighty early this morning.
It was still dark, but you did not even take a torch.
Do you have another job besides the quarry?
Yeah, a bit of a job as the moon sets.
It is actually my main job.
Must be tough.
Ohagi, as far as I can tell, you are sick with something.
But this village has no doctors.
You cannot leave this village without a traveler's pass.
But I can get you out of here.
Well, seems like I will not find any young prey here.
I would leave this place if I could.
But I have nothing to pay you with.
I just want you to live.
Yes, that is right.
I am the same as a cockroach.
Yes, you are.
All lives matter just the same.
I do not wish to die, either.
Help me, then.
Gladly.
We should go as soon as possible.
Tonight, after the moon sets and before dawn breaks.
Rest until then.
If the kidnapper is not a monster, we will not be able to find him.
Anyways, tonight's our last chance.
This will be our last night looking for the monster here.
We might be hungry, but let us do it.
Where are we going?
The village exit is not this way.
There are guards over there.
The secret passage is this way.
We will get there right before dawn.
You will have to bear with me.
It is tough on a kid to walk two nights on an empty stomach.
Sorry Hyakkimaru, guess we lucked out this time.
We should give up and go...
Ohagi, do you need to rest a little?
Who do you think I am?
I could suck the life out of you.
You are the guy we met yesterday.
The boys after the reward.
You again!
Have you come to kill me, you little brats!
That voice, in the forest.
It is her!
This woman is the spider monster.
I knew she was the kidnapper!
Get away from her, old man.
She will suck you dry.
We can get food if we beat the monster.
Go get her, Hyakkimaru.
Ohagi, a monster?
Do not you get what I am saying?
That woman is a monster and a kidnapper!
I am the kidnapper.
I have helped people escape from here.
Ohagi did not do it.
I do not mind being caught, but please let Ohagi go.
She is sick and weakened.
Sick?
Why protect a monster!
So you are the one behind it all.
We finally got you.
We are the ones that found him.
We can have that reward, right?
Yeah, right.
We just said that to lure any squealers.
That is too cruel.
That is dirty, you guys are villains!
Fine with us.
If we lose any more workers and work slows down, our heads will go flying.
Catch that man!
Tastes disgusting.
Bro...
I see you will not let me go.
Do not just stand there.
Your job is not done yet.
Which way?
-That way!
-Okay.
Hyakkimaru, stay still for a bit.
I was wrong about the reward, so what now?
I am with ya!
What, you are scared?
They will catch up to us if we walk.
I am fine.
Then here we go.
Ready?
You are all in good health now, it seems.
You will not need me anymore, huh.
I am not strong enough to cross the mountain.
I need to suck out 5 or 6 more men's life force.
Do you kill them?
Humans are precious prey.
I do not take their lives.
If they are alive, their life force revives.
Then I suck it out again.
Living together is the secret to a long life.
I see.
From now on too, right?
Yeah.
Good.
Hyakkimaru!
Not even you could climb this.
We will just have to go after them.
Let us go.
This is the secret passage?
It is small here, but wider inside.
Hear that water?
Follow it and you will reach the stream on the other side.
It is a natural cave.
You will not need a light.
They will never catch you.
My job is done.
Now go.
You are coming, too.
You cannot stay here now that they know your identity.
Think of what they will do to you.
Yes, they will use me to warn people.
Is that what you want?
-No... -Then let us escape.
Do not want to be with a monster?
Okay, Ohagi.
Instead of dying here in this village, I will live on as your prey.
I will never meet a human as strange as you again.
Then let us go...
No!
That is what happens when you betray the lord.
Kill him together with the monster woman!
You bastards!
I will drain every drop of your life force!
Hyakkimaru!
There is no doctor here, right?
Then I will take you to one.
I will not let you die.
I see one of us will have to die.
No, do not kill...
Ohagi, you never have, and you never will, right?
They are gone now.
A ghoul that likes a human, huh.
The world's full of surprises.
But it is a good thing your hearing was back.
Or else it would have ended in a really awkward way.
Still do not want to speak?
Fine, I will talk enough for two and cheer things up.
Huh?
A spider, ouch!
It bit me!
Sorry, I am the one that scared you, huh.
Hey, did you just...
You laughed at me!
I heard that, your first laugh!
But that is not the kind I wanted to hear.
Not the kind that makes fun of people.
A happier laugh, you know?
Sorrow scatters in the wind,
piling up to form shadows
Our footsteps admonish indifference in such verbose ways
As I peek into your fathomless eyes, I lose my composure
Is there any hope in the place I am heading to?
I feign amusement and laugh
because this road is so dark
I will be there to shine the light
I am used to playing at saying goodbye,
but I cried when I waved to you
Our fiery woes fade... and fade... until night falls upon us
If I knew tomorrow would be so mundane,
I would not have said that I wanted to live
I know it is futile but cannot help dreaming of a future... a future... you are to blame
Jorogumo
